name: Portrait of the Saviors
loreDescription: A portrait featuring the faces of the heroes who vanished after saving Orbis, drawn from Ras's memory by a famous Ezeran artist.

skillDescription.base: Increases damage dealt by 10.0% if the enemy's Health is more than 50%.
skillDescription.max: Increases damage dealt by 20.0% if the enemy's Health is more than 50%.
